Sound money is a term that both Keynes and the Austrians used.  Keynes: a money with a stable price. Austrians: an emergent money chosen by the marketplace.  Ethereum is taking Keynesian strategy. Bitcoin is taking an Austrian strategy.  May the best economic theory win!
